welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Calimesa, a charming city nestled in the heart of Southern California. Known for its beautiful scenery and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that Calimesa has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Banning Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Banning Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Norton AFB Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments at Norton AFB Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ryan Field Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Ryan Field Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport offers a comfortable waiting area and a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, restrooms, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: For private jet travelers, the private aviation terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience with VIP lounges and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
